channel.title: Can I set it up so a certain level gives you members?
channel.description: :cool: :mad: Everyone in my server just asks and asks for members I was wondering. Could it be set up so at level 100 they automatically get it?

item.title: Can I set it up so a certain level gives you members?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Let’s say the boolean that everyone is NOT a member is called:

Members = false;

In the levelUp method, when they have reached 100 of that certain level, the reward could be:

Members = true;

case 0: //Attack Skill //Whatever is here if(playerLevel[0] == 100) { Members = true; } break;

Read full topic
item.source: Can I set it up so a certain level gives you members?
